title: Antietam National Battlefield: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit         Late fall sunset with Maryland Monument (left), New York State Monument (center), and 20th New York Monument (right).     Basic Information Learn more about operating hours and directions.   Places to Go Some key places to visit include the visitor center, Dunker Church, and the National Cemetery.  During the summer months and weekends during the spring and fall, stop and visit the  Pry House Field Hospital.   Things to Do Learn, listen, hike, and explore. There are many things to do at Antietam, check out our calendar for special programs held throughout the year.   Safety   Accessibility
